survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Scooter Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an optional open-text follow-up (SINGLE_CHOICE).

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture diverse preferences.

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in an electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the electric scooter sharing service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit to 500 characters.

script.question_text: Please share any additional feedback or suggestions for improving the electric scooter sharing service.
